name: Branding Made Simple: A Step-by-step Template
description:
Being a visual designer and entrepreneur, I believe that good branding can bring an impact to your business.


I also wish to empower others to design. Therefore, I have created a template to help you create a simple brand identity, quickly! This step-by-step template is created with design thinking in mind and putting the users first, as I believe that branding is more than making things look pretty. It includes helper cards where you can drag and drop, suggestions, and helpful links to get you started.


This is great for university students, early startup founders, or anyone who wants to whip up a quick brand, no prior skills needed.


This is the first iteration of this template, I would love any feedback if you've tried it!


Made with love by Sarah Tan
